name: Box Hill Stepping Stones walk, Box Hill

ai.summary: A pleasant 5.9 km easy loop around Box Hill, featuring the famous stepping stones across a river and panoramic views of the Surrey Hills. Suitable for families and casual walkers seeking a relaxed hike with gentle climbs.
ai.terrain_summary: Mainly chalk paths with well-marked trails and occasional steps. Gentle ascents with some uneven ground and a few muddy patches, especially after rain. The standout feature is crossing the stepping stones over a stream near the Stepping Stones area.
ai.safety_notes: Wear sturdy, waterproof walking boots and bring a light waterproof layer. Slippery stepping stones can be hazardous when wet; take care when crossing and avoid them in flood conditions. Stay on marked paths, supervise children, and be mindful of weather changes and exposed sections.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking boots or shoes with good grip
ai.best_seasons: Spring and autumn (March–May and September–October) for milder weather and scenery; the route is also doable year-round, though summers can be busier and winters mudier.

seo.title: Box Hill Stepping Stones Walk – Easy 5.9 km Loop (Box Hill, UK)
seo.meta_description: Explore the Box Hill Stepping Stones walk, an easy 5.9 km route with river crossing stepping stones, chalk paths, and panoramic views of the Surrey Hills.
seo.h1: Box Hill Stepping Stones Walk – Easy 5.9 km
